name: BADASS BOWLING 64 (DEMO)
description:
BADASS BOWLING 64 is the ultimate Bowling game ever conceived for y'all, future Bowling Champions out there! New incredible 64 bit, bobbling 3D Graphic awaits you, my dudes!

Embark on strike streak with myself, the great Big D, Bowling Master since the '97 (3rd place at the majestic Albuquerque Contest) and your new instructor bro. I accurately made every part of this Bowling game with my hands, a Bowling Experience even better than Uii Sports Bowling on the Minvento Uii.

Dude, I can't wait to meet you dudes on the Bowling alleys!

I bet y'all can't beat my 40.001 record! (Literally impossible, cause if you liberals don't know it, I'm a Bowling genius)
